TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CommandManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供为类所有者和命令注册 和 对象、添加和移除命令事件处理程序的与命令有关的实用程序方法，并提供查询命令状态的服务。

span.span: Provides command related utility methods that register and objects for class owners and commands, add and remove command event handlers, and provides services for querying the status of a command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 负责管理路由命令。The is responsible for managing routed commands. 有关命令的详细信息, 请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information about commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md). 使用 将注册到类, 而不是实例。Use to register a to a class as opposed to an instance. 使用 将注册到类, 而不是实例。Use to register an to a class as opposed to an instance. 方法强制 引发 事件。The method forces the to raise the event. 此事件通知命令源查询它与之相关联的命令, 以确定是否可以执行该命令。The event informs a command source to query the command it is associated with to determine whether or not the command can execute.

summary.span: 强制 引发 事件。

span.span: Forces the to raise the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在确定命令目标何时发生更改时 (如键盘焦点发生变化) 的某些条件才会引起注意。The only pays attention to certain conditions in determining when the command target has changed, such as change in keyboard focus. 在不能充分确定导致命令无法执行的情况下, 可以调用来强制引发事件的情况, 在这种情况下, 可以调用来强制引发事件。In situations where the does not sufficiently determine a change in conditions that cause a command to not be able to execute, can be called to force the to raise the event. ## Examples 下面的示例使用定期调用来强制引发事件。The following example uses a to periodically call to force the to raise the event. [!code-csharp[InvalidateRequeryWithDispatcherTimer#InvalidateSampleDispatcherTimer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InvalidateRequeryWithDispatcherTimer/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#invalidatesampledispatchertimer)] [!code-vb[InvalidateRequeryWithDispatcherTimer#InvalidateSampleDispatcherTimer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InvalidateRequeryWithDispatcherTimer/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#invalidatesampledispatchertimer)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event RequerySuggested As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 检测可能更改要执行的命令的功能的条件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the detects conditions that might change the ability of a command to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将处理程序作为弱引用保存到处理程序中。This event holds onto the handler as a weak reference. 侦听此事件的对象应保持对其事件处理程序的强引用, 以避免被垃圾回收。Objects that listen for this event should keep a strong reference to their event handler to avoid it being garbage collected. 这可以通过在附加到此事件之前或之后将该处理程序作为值进行分配来实现。This can be accomplished by having a private field and assigning the handler as the value before or after attaching to this event.
